items.title: 50 Seasons Strong
items.subtitle: Half a century of Magpies pride
items.extended: Since 1973, Dudley Redhead JRL AFC has been a cornerstone of Newcastle rugby league. 50 years of tradition, community, and pride.

items.title: Charlie's Run
items.subtitle: Supporting our community
items.extended: Our annual community event bringing together players, families, and supporters for a great cause.

items.title: NRL Stage
items.subtitle: Playing on the big stage
items.extended: Our junior teams getting the opportunity to showcase their skills at premier NRL venues.

items.title: Volunteers
items.subtitle: 100% community powered
items.extended: Every match, every training session, every success - powered entirely by our dedicated volunteers.

items.title: Youth Development
items.subtitle: Building future stars
items.extended: Comprehensive development programs for all ages and skill levels, from grassroots to competitive.
